author: Hannah Bleau
title: SoCal county recommends covering face in public...
description: SoCal county recommends covering face in public... (Second column, 5th story, link ) Related stories: Asia may have been right about masks...
content:
Health officials in Riverside County, California, are recommending the widespread use of masks in public to help flatten the curve of the novel coronavirus, according to a press release sent on Tuesday.
